document.masterDocTitle: A new species of the genus Neolycaena de Nicéville, 1890 from Kyrgyzstan (Lepidoptera, Lycaenidae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A new species of the genus Neolycaena de Nicéville, 1890 from Kyrgyzstan (Lepidoptera, Lycaenidae)

subSubSection.paragraph:
Lycaena Tengstroemi Ersch.
var.
Carbonaria
Groum-Grshimaïlo, 1890, Mémoires sur les Lépidoptères 4: 388; pl. 8, fig. 9 (Type locality: “Dzhilantau, Baldjouan, Buchara”, after lectotype designation ( Zhdanko, 1998b: 653; lectotype in ZISP ).

Material examined. 1 male ,
23.v.1885
, Dzhilantau , Baldjouan , Buchara ( ZISP ) ( lectotype of
carbonaria
)
;
7 males , 2 females ,
23.v.1885
, same data ( ZISP ) ( paralectotypes of
carbonaria
)
;
1 male , Osch , Stgr. ( ZISP ) ( holotype of oschi )
;
2 males , 1 female , Osch ( ZISP )
; 1 male, Samarkand (ZISP);
3 males ,
8.vi.1969
,
W. Alai Mts.
, Pashkaut valley ,
2500 m

Distribution. Widely distributed in the mountains of Middle Asia and SE Kazakhstan .
Habitats. Dry meadows, stony slopes in middle-mountains and highlands (over 2000 m ) (plate 3: figs. 5, 6).
